Academic Content Writer Job at Miva Open University




        
    

        
        Miva Open University is an education company building a new kind of university targeted at the African region. Miva, a subsidiary of the uLesson Group, is a Pan-African Distance e-Learning University that is built on a couple of beliefs: Firstly, we believe that the traditional brick-and-mortar approach to tertiary education is no longer a viable option for serving learners on the African continent. This approach will not provide the capacity and efficacy for the people of the region.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Academic Content Writer
Job Location: Abuja (FCT)

Job Summary
We are hiring Academic Content Writers for the following courses:
     

            
    




	Accounting,
	Economics,
	Computing,
	Nursing,
	Criminology,
	Public Health,
	Business Management,
	Public Policy &
	Mass Communication.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree (Master’s degree preferred)


Skills:


	Strong writing skills and deep knowledge of the subject area
	Excellent quality assurance skills.

        Acoustic Expert Limited - Our client, a newly established 5-star luxury hotel in Obada, Abeokuta, is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Hotel Manager (Senior Level)

Job Location: Obada, Abeokuta - Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	We are seeking an experienced Hotel Manager to oversee hotel operations, establish service standards, and lead the team in delivering world-class guest experiences.
	Lead the launch of a luxury hotel! Manage daily operations, staff, budgets, and service standards.


Requirements
     

            
    




	Candidate should possess an ND, Bachelor's or Master's Degree
	5–7 years of senior experience in luxury hotels required
	Strong leadership and guest-focused excellence.
	Proximity to the location is important.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates send their CV and Cover Letter to: outsourcingwithify@gmail.com using "Hotel Manager" as the subject of the email.
